jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Develop new/change requests involving custom program i.e. RICEFW (Report, Interface, Conversion, Extension, Form, Workflow) ● Support technical matters of SAP ABAP e.g. bug-fixing, etc 
● Maintain and monitor interface program and background job 
● Other technical supports required for day-to-day transactions involving ERP system and its satellite systems
jobsJson.description:
● Develop new/change requests involving custom program i.e. RICEFW (Report, Interface, Conversion, Extension, Form, Workflow) ● Support technical matters of SAP ABAP e.g. bug-fixing, etc
● Maintain and monitor interface program and background job
● Other technical supports required for day-to-day transactions involving ERP system and its satellite systems
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Graduated from IT Major (with Programming skills)
  • Has exposure with SAP ABAP program 1-3 years for module FI, CO, MM
  • Has exposure with commonly used database management system
  • Preferably has exposure working in SAP consulting firm 
  • Preferably has Fiori development experience
  • Willing to learn and work on new things
  • Willing to work extra hours if required
